issue.summary: Add export functionality for issue reports
issue.description:
Users should be able to export issue lists to CSV or Excel format for external reporting and analysis.

**Requirements:**
- Support CSV and Excel formats
- Include all visible columns from the issue list
- Apply current filters to export
- Add export button to issue list page
issue.description_html:
Users should be able to export issue lists to CSV or Excel format for external reporting and analysis.

Requirements:

  • Support CSV and Excel formats
  • Include all visible columns from the issue list
  • Apply current filters to export
  • Add export button to issue list page

comment_form.content: <textarea name="content" cols="40" rows="4" placeholder="Add a comment (Markdown supported)" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" required id="id_content"></textarea>
